nbdev_sieve
================

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

README file and the index of documentation.

## Install

``` sh
pip install nbdev_sieve
```

## How to use

For now only the sieve(N: int) generator can be called

``` python
N = 100
primes = [p for p in sieve(N)]
print (len(primes))
```

    25
